description: This Kotlin source file defines the ProfileFragment class, which manages the user profile screen in an Android application. It handles displaying user information, logout functionality, and options like About, Help, and clearing favorites.

classes.name: ProfileFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that displays user profile info, handles logout, and provides additional options like About and Help.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment and sets it to have options menu.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the layout, sets greeting text, binds About info, and handles logout button click.

methods.name: onCreateOptionsMenu
methods.description: Inflates the menu options for profile options.

methods.name: onOptionsItemSelected
methods.description: Handles menu item selections such as showing About dialog, navigating to Help, and clearing favorites.
